Class CostSheetController

This controller is created based on the cost sheet view model and domain model classes It allows the creation of a cost sheet as well as its editing, listing, and deletion.

Inheritance
System.Object
CostSheetController
Namespace: WorkflowManagementSystem.Controllers
Assembly: WorkflowManagementSystem.dll
Syntax
public class CostSheetController : Controller
